description.value: For items of type reference, the reference can be populated either by picking an existing entity or by creating a new one. In the latter case, this Questionnaire allows specifying the Questionnaire to use in creating the target instance. This can be direct (if the Reference is to a Questionnaire) or indirect via mapping if the Reference is to some other sort of resource.

purpose.value: Allows creation of references to be Questionnaire-based.

definition.value: For items of type reference, the reference can be populated either by picking an existing entity or by creating a new one. This can be direct (if the Reference is to a Questionnaire) or indirect via mapping if the Reference is to some other sort of resource.
